effect_entries.effect: When this Pokémon is knocked out by a move that makes contact, the move's user takes 1/4 its maximum HP in damage.
effect_entries.short_effect: Damages the attacker for 1/4 its max HP when knocked out by a contact move.

effect_entries.effect:
Whenever a physical move hits this Pokémon, its Speed rises one stage and its Defense falls one stage.

This ability triggers on every hit of a multiple-hit move.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises Speed and lowers Defense by one stage each upon being hit by a physical move.

effect_entries.effect:
This Pokémon's damaging moves have a 10% chance to make the target flinch with each hit if they do not already cause flinching as a secondary effect.

This ability does not stack with a held item.

Overworld: The wild encounter rate is halved while this Pokémon is first in the party.
effect_entries.short_effect: Has a 10% chance of making target Pokémon flinch with each hit.
